con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://sanvitti.com/" xmlns:s="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://sanvitti.com/"> <s:element name="GetRmaEsnListing"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="serviceRequest" type="tns:RmaEsnListingRequest"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="RmaEsnListingRequest"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="UserCredentials" type="tns:UserCredentials"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="FromDate" type="s:dateTime"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="ToDate" type="s:dateTime"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="EsnStatus" type="tns:RMAStatus"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="RmaStatus" type="tns:RMAStatus"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="UserCredentials"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="UserName" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="Password" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:simpleType name="RMAStatus"> <s:restriction base="s:string"> <s:enumeration value="None"/> <s:enumeration value="Pending"/> <s:enumeration value="Received"/> <s:enumeration value="PendingForRepair"/> <s:enumeration value="PendingForCredit"/> <s:enumeration value="PendingForReplacement"/> <s:enumeration value="Approved"/> <s:enumeration value="Returned"/> <s:enumeration value="Credited"/> <s:enumeration value="Denied"/> <s:enumeration value="Closed"/> <s:enumeration value="OutWithOEMForRepair"/> <s:enumeration value="BackToStockNDF"/> <s:enumeration value="BackToStockCredited"/> <s:enumeration value="BackToStockReplacedByOEM"/> <s:enumeration value="RepairedByOEM"/> <s:enumeration value="ReplacedBYOEM"/> <s:enumeration value="ReplacedByAV"/> <s:enumeration value="RepairedByAV"/> <s:enumeration value="NDFNoDefectFound"/> <s:enumeration value="PreOwnedAstock"/> <s:enumeration value="PreOwnedBtock"/> <s:enumeration value="PreOwnedCtock"/> <s:enumeration value="Rejected"/> <s:enumeration value="RTSReturnToStock"/> <s:enumeration value="Incomplete"/> <s:enumeration value="Damaged"/> <s:enumeration value="Preowned"/> <s:enumeration value="ReturnToOEM"/> <s:enumeration value="ReturnedToStock"/> <s:enumeration value="Cancel"/> <s:enumeration value="ExternalESN"/> <s:enumeration value="PendingShipToOEM"/> <s:enumeration value="SentToOEM"/> <s:enumeration value="PendingShipToSupplier"/> <s:enumeration value="SentToSupplier"/> <s:enumeration value="ReturnedFromOEM"/> <s:enumeration value="ShippingError"/> <s:enumeration value="ReplacedByOEMNew"/> <s:enumeration value="ReplacedByOEMPreowned"/> </s:restriction> </s:simpleType> <s:element name="GetRmaEsnListingResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="GetRmaEsnListingResult" type="tns:RmaEsnListingResponse"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="RmaEsnListingResponse"> name="RmaEsnListing" type="tns:ArrayOfRmaEsnStatuses"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="ArrayOfRmaEsnStatuses"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="RmaEsnStatuses" nillable="true" type="tns:RmaEsnStatuses"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="RmaEsnStatuses"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="SKU" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="RmaNumber" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="ESN" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="RmaStatus" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="EsnStatus" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="RmaDate" type="s:dateTime"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="AVPO" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:element name="GetRmaEsnDetail"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true" type="tns:RMAESNDetail"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="RMAESNDetail"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="CategoryName" type="s:string"/> type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="CustomerName" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="Address" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" </s:element> <s:complexType name="RMASearchCriteria"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="RMANumber" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="RMAStatus" type="tns:RMAStatus"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="ESN" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="ReturnReason" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="RMA_To_Date" type="s:dateTime"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="RMA_From_Date" type="s:dateTime"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="Authentication" type="tns:clsAuthentication"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="clsAuthentication"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="UserName" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="Password" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:element name="GetRMAResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="GetRMAResult" type="tns:RMAResponse"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="RMAResponse"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="RmaReportList" type="tns:ArrayOfRMAReport"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="ErrorCode" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="Comment" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="ArrayOfRMAReport"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="RMAReport" nillable="true" type="tns:RMAReport"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="RMAReport"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="RMANumber" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="RMADate" type="s:dateTime"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="SKU" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="ESN" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="DefectReason" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="Status" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="Notes" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="LanglobalNotes" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:element name="SetRMA"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="RMARequest" type="tns:RMAAPIRequest"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="RMAAPIRequest"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="RMA" type="tns:RMANew"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="Authentication" type="tns:clsAuthentication"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="RMANew"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="StoreID" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="RMADetail" type="tns:RMADetails"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="RmaNumber" nillable="true" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="CustomerRmaNumber" nillable="true" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="RmaDate" type="s:date"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="RmaContactName" nillable="true" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="Email" nillable="true" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="Phone" nillable="true" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="Address" nillable="true" type="s:string"/> maxOccurs="1" name="Zip" nillable="true" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="Comment" nillable="true" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="RMADetails"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="Disposition" type="tns:Disposition"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="Warranty" type="tns:Warranty"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="ESN" nillable="true" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="Reason" type="tns:RMAReason"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="Notes" nillable="true" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="LinkedPurchaseOrder" nillable="true" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="LinkedPOLineNumber" type="s:int"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:simpleType name="Disposition"> <s:restriction base="s:string"> <s:enumeration value="None"/> <s:enumeration value="Credit"/> <s:enumeration value="Replaced"/> <s:enumeration value="Repair"/> <s:enumeration value="Discarded"/> </s:restriction> </s:simpleType> <s:simpleType name="Warranty"> <s:restriction base="s:string"> <s:enumeration value="None"/> <s:enumeration value="Warranty"/> <s:enumeration value="OutOfWarranty"/> </s:restriction> </s:simpleType> <s:simpleType name="RMAReason"> <s:restriction base="s:string"> value="Others"/> <s:enumeration value="MissingParts"/> <s:enumeration value="ReturnToStock"/> <s:enumeration value="BuyerRemorse"/> <s:enumeration value="PhysicalAbuse"/> <s:enumeration
